info.description: Cactacea / Cactacea backend API for web and mobile applications
info.title: Cactacea backend API

get.summary: Find users

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Filters users whose user name start of.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filters users which started on since or later.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of users. By default the value is 0.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of users returned on one result page. By default the value is 20 users. The page size can never be larger than 50.

get.summary: Find session tweets

parameters.description: Filters tweets which started on since or later.
